2.rawvalue:
Welcome to our tiny experiment. 

tiny.hn wants you to be able to build dynamic websites applications without having to learn html, using a spreadsheet and a webpage editor you can build what you want without dealing with us pesky programmers.

Dont worry if you are confused by the editor, you must be one of our friends and got here early, it will be getting updated daily. However if you managed to overcome all obstacles and build something awesome, or want to tell us what you cant do but want to, send is a message [here][1], we will be putting a showcase of your best applications up at [tiny.hn][2]

[click here to edit your home page][3]

[click here to edit it as a spreadsheet!][4]


  [1]: http://tiny.hn/contact/
  [2]: http://tiny.hn
  [3]: /?view=_global/pagebuilder
  [4]: /?view=_global/spreadsheet
